content: do you love those fuck cancer hats but need to be a little more…discrete this crochet beanie is suitable for any audience - carefully placed popcorn stitches spell out fuck cancer in braille for a hidden message that packs a punch this crochet pattern creates a beanie that is designed to be worn by anyone using a soft breathable yarn and a fitted design intended to be comfortable on tender skin it s suitable as a cancer cap or as a fitted beanie for anyone who shares the sentiment this is a lighter weight hat making it suitable for warmer months as well as those with a bit of a chill it calls for a 3 weight yarn specifically designed with lion brand coboo as this tends to be a thinner yarn for a 3 weight gauge swatching is highly recommended ----- safety statement included files have been checked to ensure that they are free of viruses any and all links contained within these files have been checked and verified to ensure that they are functional and safe at the time of publication users are encouraged to follow the recommended safety protocol for all recommended tools and materials within this pattern no guarantees are made as to the safety of finished products created from this pattern it is the user s responsibility to determine if finished items meet current applicable safety standards for their intended purpose
